episodes.title: How to Avoid a Cult-Like Church in Britain & America With Dr. Dougie Marks Pt. 2
episodes.description:
I wanted to create a toolkit of how to spot a narcissist in charismatic evangelical churches. We reviewed my counselling session and then I wanted to speak with Dr Dougie Marks about bad leaders, the wider system, why people cover up abuse and maybe how we can do this better.

Dr Dougie Marks is a Health Psychologist, CBT Practitioner and Lecturer in Behavioural Sciences. His work spans the areas of teaching, research, consultancy and clinical practice.

00:00 Recap on my CBT counselling session
02:23 How a therapist approaches an individual 
03:04 Five Factor Personality Model 
11:46 Where do abusive leaders fit? 
19:36 Can we understand the narcissist? 
21:12 John Smyth & Evangelicalism
22:38 The Dark Triad 
26:39 How to spot the bad guy - and why people cover up abuse
39:42 How to avoid a church cult - Summary 
40:19 Why do people cover up abuse?
47:43 The biggest trauma occurs 

Connect with Dougie here: https://uk.linkedin.com/in/dr-dougie-marks-407a2030

We discuss the Church of England and how Archbishops cover up abuse, how church leaders can be abusive in the first place. We also talk about how to spot a  Church leader who is bad news and how to spot a toxic church, even the one you might be attending.

Please seek help if this challenges you or upsets you. We cover big issues.

**
Please do get in touch as all the emails I receive are incredibly encouraging. Sorry for the missing camera angle - the focus was well off so it's just one camera for this video - sorry.

I'm going to be unpacking Religious Trauma, Abuse, the Church, different faiths over the next few weeks .

Here's a quick update about what's coming up, why I'm doing this and why I need you.

Navel-gazing becomes pretty boring pretty quickly - so I'm meeting loads of really interesting people and planning interviews all over the place, learning about them and their stories.

This channel is about learning from the past and looking to the future, whilst hopefully enjoying the present. Please Subscribe!

episodes.title: Justin Welby looked more like a politician than a priest - and thank you!
episodes.description:
I've been overwhelmed this weekend by everyone's response to the videos I've made. I wanted to make a video that was vaguely more exciting than just looking at my 'boat race', so I thought I'd take you on my local dog walking route.

Like so many, I've been so disappointed by how the C of E has dealt with the confirmed abuse cases and continues to respond appallingly. My little experience with Soul Survivor started me on this road, but since speaking with people involved with the abusers Fletcher and Smyth - I cannot even begin to recognise how self serving the Church of England has become. I still cannot understand why Justin Welby cannot simply put videos out himself with his comms team rather than speak to Channel 4 and behave more like a trust-losing politician than a loving and serving leader of the church... it really should be that simple!

episodes.title: Adult Grooming: A Disease within the Evangelical Church
episodes.description:
As I continue to think about my church experience and speak with others who've been victim to abusers, cult-like churches and very destructive environments, I wondered if the 'safe' evangelicals in the Church of England actually has built a culture of adult grooming.

I'd love to hear what you think, but once again, this video is the result of a bunch of conversations with lots of very lovely people.

My aim to make a documentary about some of these subtle nuances have been put to bed as I don't believe there is the audience but I do think YouTube is worth continuing with. Please get in touch if you'd like to be involved at mascotfilms.com

episodes.title: Christianity: Soul Survivor Church, Charismatic Evangelical hurts people Rant
episodes.description:
It has been 13 months since I learned that I wasn't the only person that had an odd experience as a fee paying gap year student at Soul Survivor with Mike Pilavachi 25 years ago. 

After speaking with countless victims of abuse from churches and christian organisations, those involved haven't wanted to speak with me. 

I'm moving from looking at Soul Survivor to the entire Evangelical Charismatic and Church of England  ( C of E) that threw a veil over the abuse those with responsibility were aware of.
